name: Paula Burghelea
profile: I started working at 18 in Italy cleanning house. After one year I decided that I wanted to go back to Romania and start university. I came back to visit the lovely lady I've worked for almost a year and asked if she was happy with the person tacking care of her house and after saying yes she pause and said "Paula, non c'Ã¨ nessuna come te!". This was the first compliment I had ever received for how I did my work and I strived to keep that in mind with every job I strated doing. A deep understanding of who I am and what God is shapping each day is what ultimatly motivates me to do my work well and love people arround me.
